description: Analyzes repository code to detect technology stack, identify deployment blockers, provide auto-fix suggestions, and generate readiness scores

blockers.description: Found a hardcoded API key: 'const API_KEY = "sk_test_abc123"'. This may compromise application security.
blockers.auto_fix:
// Replace hardcoded API key with environment variable
const API_KEY = process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY;

blockers.description: Environment variable REACT_APP_API_KEY is referenced in code but not documented in .env.example.
Missing 'start' script in package.json. This may prevent deployment to some hosting providers.

recommendations: Remove all hardcoded secrets and replace with environment variables.
Document all required environment variables in .env.example.
Ensure package.json includes scripts for starting and building the app.
Resolve all dependency version conflicts before deployment.
